title: Game keeps freezing, FPS and ping are fine
body: Since yesterday I am having "lag" issues...yet my internet is fine, my frames stay the same as always and so does my ping. I click to move my champ and my champ wont move yet I can still see everything around me including when i get jumped on and murdered. I have actually DCd a few times as well for maybe 5 minutes or less at a time. When i reconnect I still have the same issues. 2 other players in my last match complained about the same issue so I know its not just me.

replies.body:
Your internet might be fine, but your network sounds like it's unstable at least specifically to the game server.  Specifically, it sounds like both packet loss until it deteriorates and disconnects you.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the impact game, which will give you an overview to know for sure.

The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help here, but I recommend testing in in custom games.
Thank you so much!! I will try all these steps. Love the new lag report tool!
Just played one last game and it was unplayable....could not move the entire game. Lost us the game.
